subject: JUnit - httpunit vs htmlunit
msgSnippet: Hi everybody, I m new with JUnit and try to test my websites with one of the tools like httpunit or htmlunit. But unfortunately I don t really know which of
messageBody:
Hi everybody,

I'm new with JUnit and try to test my websites with one of the tools
like httpunit or htmlunit. But unfortunately I don't really know
which of them is better for testing?
Can anybody tell me where are the main differences and in which case
I should prefer one of this tools?

Thank you very much and have a nice day.
C U
thecyriuz
